## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e555e285993ff5179f3dad8424c83097053d02d6b4a91a72319eaabb6f1e6282)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@awan_7715/model-viewer-space-opera' @ 1.1.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
